titulo: Craft magical meals to feed fantasy hordes in card-based cooking sim Arcane Eats
A giant cop has his eye on you in Militsioner, the most bizarre immersive sim I've ever seen
descricao: PCGS 2025Militsioner is a game about surveillance and crime.

titulo: Hell Clock, the Diablo-like action RPG based on a bloody passage of Brazil's history, is out later this month
descricao: PCGS 2025Hell Clock tells a dark story about The Canudos war in 1896.

titulo: Lost Rift is a base-building, survival sim, extraction shooter mashup that you can try at Steam Next Fest
descricao: PCGS 2025Lost Rift showed a little more of itself at the PC Gaming Show 2025

titulo: Paralives finally has a release date so I can finally go wild on its delightfully tactile building and endlessly cozy vibes
descricao: PCGS 2025Another win for life sim enjoyers.

titulo: TerraTech Legion is basically like if you got to drop your own deadly LEGO car into Vampire Survivors
descricao: PCGS 2025Build and customise your perfect death-car in this new spin-off.

titulo: PIGFACE is a gnarly neo-noir FPS with freeform assassination missions and a demo that just dropped on Steam
Vanquish the big bad, then chase them back through time and kill 'em again in Eversiege: Untold Ages, a co-op PvE loot-em-up
descricao: PCGS 2025Eversiege: Untold Ages has a new spin on Moba-style mechanics and macro management.

titulo: I'm obsessed with goblinAmerica, an FPS where you play the goblin president crouch sliding through a psychedelic dream world
descricao: PCGS 2025Goblin president has my vote every time.
